body:
Comment 1: 
I think this is working as intended.
While we might have decided to close t.C on Stop
during the design phase, it's too late to make
such a fundamental change in the API: all the callers
expect that <-t.C only succeeds for actual ticks.
You can use select to tell a goroutine waiting on
t.C that the ticking is over.

Leaving for r.
